meanings.definition: Occurring or situated between two points in time or space.
meanings.sent1: The squirrel found a cozy spot in the intervening branches of the tree.
meanings.sent2: The map showed the intervening towns between our house and the beach.
meanings.sent3: The cat napped peacefully in the intervening hours before dinner.
meanings.sent4: The moon peeked through the intervening clouds, casting a soft glow.
meanings.sent5: The rainbow appeared in the sky, its colors separated by the intervening raindrops.

meanings.definition: Coming between in time or order.
meanings.sent1: We will have lunch intervening the morning meeting and the afternoon presentation.
meanings.sent2: The dessert was served intervening the main course and the coffee.
meanings.sent3: The magician performed his tricks intervening the acts of the circus.
meanings.sent4: The commercial aired intervening the TV show, catching everyone's attention.
meanings.sent5: The break was scheduled intervening the long work hours, giving employees a rest.

meanings.definition: To come between so as to prevent or alter a result or course of events.
meanings.sent1: She intervened in the argument, calming both parties down.
meanings.sent2: The teacher intervened when the students started to argue.
meanings.sent3: The referee intervened to stop the fight before it escalated.
meanings.sent4: The doctor intervened to save the patient's life during surgery.
meanings.sent5: The superhero intervened just in time to prevent the disaster from happening.
